subject: FW: How to parametrize TestCases?
msgSnippet: Hi, Does anyone know if it is possible to parameterize TestCases by specifying arbitrary arguments/properties so that they are readily available in test*
messageBody:
Hi,
Does anyone know if it is possible to parameterize TestCases by specifying
arbitrary arguments/properties so that they are readily available in "test*"
methods? This seems like such an obvious thing to do, but I don't see any
intuitive way in the framework to accomplish this.

For example, if my test requires user name and password, I don't want to
hardcode this information in the test itself, but rather pass it in, either
through command line arguments or some property file entries. The only
solution I can think of is to define "main" method in my TestCase subclass
that invokes the Runner and store command line arguments in some
global/static variable so that the "test" methods have access to it. This
seems a bit ugly though...

Any help is highly appreciated,
Alex
